member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionProcessorType.None
member.summary: Do not highlight motion on image.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionProcessorType.BlobCountingObjects
member.summary: Motion processing algorithm, which counts separate moving objects and highlights them.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionProcessorType.GridMotionAreaProcessing
member.summary: Motion processing algorithm, which performs grid processing of motion frame.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionProcessorType.MotionAreaHighlighting
member.summary: Motion processing algorithm, which highlights motion areas.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionProcessorType.MotionBorderHighlighting
member.summary: Motion processing algorithm, which highlights border of motion areas.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionDetectorType.CustomFrameDifference
member.summary: Motion detector based on difference with predefined background frame.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionDetectorType.SimpleBackgroundModeling
member.summary: Motion detector based on simple background modeling.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionDetectorType.TwoFramesDifference
member.summary: Motion detector based on two continues frames difference.

member.name: M:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionDetectionEventArgs.#ctor(System.Single,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Rectangle[]@,System.Single[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Number of detected objects for Blob Counting Objects processor.
Rectangles of moving objects for Blob Counting Objects processor.

Motion levels of each grid's cell. Value represents an array of size GridHeight x GridWidth, which keeps motion level of each grid's cell. If certain cell has motion level equal to 0.2, then it means that this cell has 20% of changes.

member.name: P:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionDetectionEventArgs.ObjectRectangles
member.summary: Gets rectangles of moving objects for Blob Counting Objects processor.

member.name: P:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionDetectionEventArgs.ObjectsCount
member.summary: Gets number of detected objects for Blob Counting Objects processor.

member.name: P:VisioForge.Types.AFMotionDetectionEventArgs.MotionGrid
member.summary: Gets motion levels of each grid's cell.
member.remarks: The property represents an array of size GridHeight x GridWidth, which keeps motion level of each grid's cell. If certain cell has motion level equal to 0.2, then it means that this cell has 20% of changes.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFDVDDomain.VideoManagerMenu
member.summary: Displaying menus for the entire disc. Also known as topMenu for Windows Media Player. Commonly called the title menu or the top menu.

member.summary: Displaying menus for current title set. Also known as titleMenu for Windows Media Player. Commonly called the root menu.

member.summary: The DVD Navigator is in the DVD Stop domain.

member.name: T:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoFormatConstraint
member.summary: Specifies the target format for an encoder.

member.name: T:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoBitrateMode
member.summary: Specifies the rate control mode for an encoder.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoBitrateMode.Quality
member.summary: Quality-based VBR encoding. The encoder selects the bit rate to match a specified quality level.

member.name: T:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoSystem
member.summary: Specifies the video system of the source content.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoSystem.None
member.summary: The video system is not specified.

member.name: T:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGSourceInterlacing
member.summary: Specifies whether the input frames are progressive or interlaced.

member.name: T:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGAudioMode
member.summary: Specifies the MPEG-1 audio encoding mode.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGAudioMode.JointStereo
member.summary: Joint stereo mode. This mode uses similarities between the two channels to achieve greater compression.

member.name: T:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGAudioEmphasisType
member.summary: Specifies the type of de-emphasis filter that should be used when decoding.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoFrameFieldMode.FieldMode
member.summary: The encoder produces an MPEG picture for each field in the source video.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoFrameFieldMode.FrameMode
member.summary: The encoder produces an MPEG picture for each frame (or pair of fields) in the source video.

member.name: T:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoOutputInterlacing
member.summary: Specifies how the encoder interlaces the output video.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoOutputInterlacing.SameAsInput
member.summary: The interlacing on the output frames matches the input frames.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFMSMPEGVideoOutputInterlacing.Automatic
member.summary: Use the media type on the encoder's input pin to determine whether the frames are progressive or interlaced.

member.summary: Enhanced Video Renderer, available in Vista and later.

member.summary: WPF renderer, for internal usage only.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFVideoCaptureOutputFormat.DirectCaptureDV
member.summary: DV AVI output without reencoding. Part of VisioForge DirectCapture technology.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFVideoCaptureOutputFormat.DirectCaptureMPEG
member.summary: MPEG TS or PS output without reencoding. Part of VisioForge DirectCapture technology.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFVideoCaptureOutputFormat.DirectCaptureMKV
member.summary: MKV container output without reencoding. Can be used for H264/AAC and other codecs. Part of VisioForge DirectCapture technology.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFVideoCaptureOutputFormat.MSMPEG2
member.summary: Microsoft MPEG-2 Encoder. Available in Vista / Windows 7 Home Premium and better. Not implemented in SDK yet, only for internal testing. Please do not use.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFIPSource.HTTP_JPEG
member.summary: JPEG. PCM, G.711 and G.726 audio supported.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFIPSource.HTTP_MJPEGorMPEG4orH264
member.summary: MJPEG or MPEG-4 ASP or MPEG-4 H.264. PCM, G.711 and G.726 audio supported.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFIPSource.RTSP_UDP
member.summary: RTSP via UDP source. MJPEG, MPEG-4 ASP and MPEG-4 H264 supported. PCM, G.711, G.726, AAC, MP3 audio supported.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFIPSource.RTSP_TCP
member.summary: RTSP via TCP source. MJPEG, MPEG-4 ASP and MPEG-4 H264 supported. PCM, G.711, G.726, AAC, MP3 audio supported.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFIPSource.RTSP_HTTP
member.summary: RTSP via HTTP source. MJPEG, MPEG-4 ASP and MPEG-4 H264 supported. PCM, G.711, G.726, AAC, MP3 audio supported.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFIPSource.MMS_WMV
member.summary: MMS / WMV stream from any device.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Types.VFVideoEditStreamType.VideoBlank
member.summary: Fake video stream for OnPushFrame event.
